Hello,

I want to write my own junit4 runner, to add my testListener.

I wa=
nt to extend the TestclassRunner, because this class contains a lot of func=
tionality, which I want to have. And so I must only override the run(RunNot=
ifier)methode to add my own testListener.

But the problem is, that this cl=
ass is in the org.junit.internal.runners package, which is be discouraged.
=

When I now use this I get a classDefNotFoundException. 

Which not interna=
l  runner has a similar functionality?
Or how can I also use my own listene=
r (extends RunListener).
